title: Peak online shopping hours of U.S. consumers 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 4 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 7-11_AM to 9_PM_-_2_AM.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 7-11_AM to 7-11_AM.
gold: This statistic presents the preferred time of the day for consumers in the United States to shop online . During the April 2015 survey , 48 percent of survey respondents stated that their peak online shopping hours were between 4 and 9 PM .
